ModMetaData.name: Animal Collab Project Vanilla-Style
ModMetaData.author: Ekksu / Xen / Cucumpear / Thirite / Whizzard / Lindseyrie / Walking Problem
ModMetaData.description: Adds over fifty animals into the game for every biome and environment! From Ice Sheets to Extreme Deserts, bring your game to life with some more critters!
